verses.verse: Am <WG1510> I not free <WG1658>? Am <WG1510> I not an apostle <WG652>? Have I not seen <WG3708> Jesus <WG2424> our Lord <WG2962>? Are you not my work <WG2041> in the Lord <WG2962>?
If <WG1487> to others <WG243> I am <WG1510> not an apostle, <WG652> at least <WG235> <WG1065> I am <WG1510> to you; for you are the seal <WG4973> of my apostleship <WG651> in the Lord. <WG2962>
My defense <WG627> to those <WG3588> who examine <WG350> me is this: <WG3778>
Do we not have <WG2192> a right <WG1849> to eat <WG2068> and drink <WG4095>?

Do we not have <WG2192> a right <WG1849> to take <WG4013> along <WG4013> a believing <WG79> wife, <WG1135> even <WG2532> as the rest <WG3062> of the apostles, <WG652> and the brothers <WG80> of the Lord, <WG2962> and Cephas <WG2786>?
Or <WG2228> do only <WG3441> Barnabas <WG921> and I not have <WG2192> a right <WG1849> to refrain <WG3361> from working <WG2038>?

Who <WG5101> at any <WG4218> time <WG4218> serves <WG4754> as a soldier <WG4754> at his own <WG2398> expense <WG3800>? Who <WG5101> plants <WG5452> a vineyard, <WG290> and does not eat <WG2068> the fruit <WG2590> of it? Or <WG2228> who <WG5101> tends <WG4165> a flock <WG4167> and does not use <WG2068> the milk <WG1051> of the flock <WG4167>?

I am not speaking <WG2980> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> according <WG2596> to human <WG444> judgment, <WG444> am I? Or <WG2228> does not the Law <WG3551> also <WG2532> say <WG3004> these <WG3778> things <WG3778>?

For it is written <WG1125> in the Law <WG3551> of Moses, <WG3475> "You shall not muzzle <WG2778> the ox <WG1016> while he is threshing. <WG248>" God <WG2316> is not concerned <WG3199> about oxen, <WG1016> is He?

Or <WG2228> is He speaking <WG3004> altogether <WG3843> for our sake <WG1223>? Yes, <WG1063> for our sake <WG1223> it was written, <WG1125> because <WG3754> the plowman <WG722> ought <WG3784> to plow <WG722> in hope, <WG1680> and the thresher <WG248> [to thresh] in hope <WG1680> of sharing <WG3348> [the crops.]
If <WG1487> we sowed <WG4687> spiritual <WG4152> things <WG4152> in you, is it too <WG3173> much <WG3173> if <WG1487> we should reap <WG2325> material <WG4559> things <WG4559> from you?

If <WG1487> others <WG243> share <WG3348> the right <WG1849> over you, do we not more <WG3123>? Nevertheless, <WG235> we did not use <WG5530> this <WG3778> right, <WG1849> but we endure <WG4722> all <WG3956> things, <WG3956> that we may cause <WG1325> no <WG3361> <WG5100> hindrance <WG1464> to the gospel <WG2098> of Christ. <WG5547>

Do you not know <WG3609> that those <WG3588> who perform <WG2038> sacred <WG2413> services <WG2413> eat <WG2068> the [food] of the temple, <WG2413> [and] those <WG3588> who attend <WG3918> regularly <WG3918> to the altar <WG2379> have <WG4829> their share <WG4829> with the altar <WG2379>?
So <WG3779> also <WG2532> the Lord <WG2962> directed <WG1299> those <WG3588> who proclaim <WG2605> the gospel <WG2098> to get <WG2198> their living <WG2198> from the gospel. <WG2098>

But I have used <WG5530> none <WG3762> of these <WG3778> things. <WG3778> And I am not writing <WG1125> these <WG3778> things <WG3778> that it may be done <WG1096> so <WG3779> in my case; <WG1722> for it would be better <WG2570> <WG3123> for me to die <WG599> than <WG2228> have any <WG5100> man make <WG2758> my boast <WG2745> an empty <WG2758> one.

For if <WG1437> I preach <WG2097> the gospel, <WG2097> I have nothing <WG3756> to boast <WG2745> of, for I am <WG1945> under <WG1945> compulsion; <WG318> for woe <WG3759> is me if <WG1437> I do not preach <WG2097> the gospel. <WG2097>

For if <WG1487> I do <WG4238> this <WG3778> voluntarily, <WG1635> I have <WG2192> a reward; <WG3408> but if <WG1487> against <WG210> my will, <WG210> I have a stewardship <WG3622> entrusted <WG4100> to me.

What <WG5101> then <WG3767> is my reward <WG3408>? That, when I preach <WG2097> the gospel, <WG2097> I may offer <WG5087> the gospel <WG2098> without <WG77> charge, <WG77> so <WG1519> as not to make <WG2710> full <WG2710> use <WG2710> of my right <WG1849> in the gospel. <WG2098>
For though I am <WG1510> free <WG1658> from all <WG3956> [men,] I have made <WG1402> myself <WG1683> a slave <WG1402> to all, <WG3956> that I might win <WG2770> the more. <WG4183>

And to the Jews <WG2453> I became <WG1096> as a Jew, <WG2453> that I might win <WG2770> Jews; <WG2453> to those <WG3588> who <WG3588> are under <WG5259> the Law, <WG3551> as under <WG5259> the Law, <WG3551> though not being <WG1510> myself <WG846> under <WG5259> the Law, <WG3551> that I might win <WG2770> those <WG3588> who <WG3588> are under <WG5259> the Law; <WG3551>

to those <WG3588> who are without <WG459> law, <WG459> as without <WG459> law, <WG459> though not being <WG1510> without <WG459> the law <WG459> of God <WG2316> but under <WG1772> the law <WG1772> of Christ, <WG5547> that I might win <WG2770> those <WG3588> who are without <WG459> law. <WG459>

To the weak <WG772> I became <WG1096> weak, <WG772> that I might win <WG2770> the weak; <WG772> I have become <WG1096> all <WG3956> things <WG3956> to all <WG3956> men, <WG3956> that I may by all <WG3843> means <WG3843> save <WG4982> some. <WG5100>
And I do <WG4160> all <WG3956> things <WG3956> for the sake <WG1223> of the gospel, <WG2098> that I may become <WG1096> a fellow <WG4791> partaker <WG4791> of it.

Do you not know <WG3609> that those <WG3588> who run <WG5143> in a race <WG4712> all <WG3956> run, <WG5143> but [only] one <WG1520> receives <WG2983> the prize <WG1017>? Run <WG5143> in such <WG3779> a way <WG3779> that you may win. <WG2638>

And everyone <WG3956> who competes <WG75> in the games <WG75> exercises <WG1467> self-control in all <WG3956> things. <WG3956> They then <WG3767> [do it] to receive <WG2983> a perishable <WG5349> wreath, <WG4735> but we an imperishable. <WG862>
Therefore <WG5106> I run <WG5143> in such <WG3779> a way, <WG3779> as not without <WG84> aim; <WG84> I box <WG4438> in such <WG3779> a way, <WG3779> as not beating <WG1194> the air; <WG109>

but I buffet <WG5299> my body <WG4983> and make <WG1396> it my slave, <WG1396> lest <WG3381> possibly, <WG3381> after I have preached <WG2784> to others, <WG243> I myself <WG846> should be disqualified. <WG96>
